/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by towering buildings on either side. These structures, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the hazy sky, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the left side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the urban environment. The colors in the image are predominantly gray, green, and blue, painting a picture of a city that is both modern and vibrant.
